document_data.mainbody:
Emmakk Gallum was the younger brother of Jordy Gallum, Counut of Greenshores and the Constable of Mosstone circa 1370 DR.
Sometime before 1370 DR, Emmakk Gallum succeeded his older brother, Jordy Gallum, as the Constable of Mosstone, a lush green town on the edge of the Forest of Tethir along the Trade Way. In his new position, he was one of the biggest authorities in Mosstone, apart from the local druids, however little actual authority there was in the town. Emmakk led a small guard and defenders troop of twenty-five and occasionally acted as Mosstones representative.
